Name: Facility 386
About the game: Facility 386 is an adventure-horror game made using RPG Maker. Story A group of conspiracy theorists and archaeologists search for evidence of the hypothetical extraterrestrial civilization. In their search, they stumble upon an underground facility. Soon they find themselves trapped inside and have no other choice but to go further down, revealing the horrifying story behind facility 386. Features Flashlight with two modes. Switching between them allows you to see either far ahead or near you. Be careful danger can lurk in any corner! 3 Dimensional sound. With this, you can judge the direction and the distance of danger and hopefully avoid it. Notes. Collect notes and documents scattered throughout the facility to unravel its mystery!
